501.description: Setup is only available via the CLI

attempts.description: Total attempts recorded for the binding.

lastTransitionTime.description: RFC3339 timestamp for the last transition.

message.description: Human readable context for the condition.

allowPrivileged.description: Gate for privileged capability requests (CAP_SYS_ADMIN, CAP_SYS_PTRACE, etc).

extraCapabilities.description: Explicit capabilities to inject into the container's allowed set.

mediaType.description: Media type for the snapshot artifact (default `application/x-tar`).

source.description: URI referencing the snapshot payload (e.g. `keyspace://profiles/...` or `file:///path`).

namespace.description: Optional namespace scope; defaults to `default` when omitted.

oneOf.description: Optional runtime overrides appended to the generated workload Pod.

service.description: Target service identifier (matching the OCI manifest name).

oneOf.description: Optional snapshot source used to seed persistent volumes at install time.

start.description: Indicates whether the workload should be started after reconciliation.

update.description: Forces a fresh pull of the service image even if cached layers already exist.

conditions.description: Detailed condition set mirroring Kubernetes conventions.

lastReconciledTime.description: Timestamp of the last successful reconciliation.

oneOf.description: Workload reference emitted by the controller (StatefulSet/Deployment/etc).

name.description: Workload name materialised from the bundle.

namespace.description: Namespace hosting the workload; defaults to the bundle namespace when omitted.

uid.description: Optional UID of the managed resource.

ConfigMap.description: Minimal ConfigMap resource compatible with kubectl expectations.

ContainerResources.description: Minimal resource declaration for CPU, memory, and PIDs.

ContainerSpec.description: Minimal container specification derived from Kubernetes `Container`.

ContainerStatus.description: Container-level status information compatible with kubectl expectations.

LabelSelector.description: Minimal label selector supporting exact-match labels.

ListMeta.description: Metadata included with Kubernetes list responses.

ObjectMeta.description: Minimal representation of Kubernetes object metadata.

PersistentVolumeClaimSpec.description: PersistentVolumeClaimSpec matching the subset Nanocloud requires.

Pod.description: Pod object wrapper for convenience when exporting manifests.

PodCondition.description: Minimal Pod condition representation used by kubectl wait/describe.

PodSpec.description: Minimal pod specification capturing the data Nanocloud needs.

PodStatus.description: Runtime status snapshot for the pod to surface through watch APIs.

PodTemplateSpec.description: Template describing the pods managed by the StatefulSet.

ResourceRequirements.description: Minimal representation of Kubernetes resource requirements.

StatefulSetCondition.description: High-level condition describing StatefulSet rollout state.

StatefulSetSpec.description: Minimal StatefulSet specification to support Nanocloud workloads.

StatefulSetStatus.description: Basic runtime status for a StatefulSet.

TableColumnDefinition.description: Column schema describing how clients should display table cells.

TableRow.description: Individual table row with serialized cell values and optional raw object.

VolumeMount.description: Describes how a volume is mounted inside the container.

VolumeSpec.description: Simplified volume specification supporting the sources needed by Nanocloud.
